game.name: Odd Or Even
game.pieces: There are 15 objects in a pool.
game.tomove: Remove 1, 2, or 3 objects from the pool and place them in front of you.
game.towin: Have an even number of objects in front of you when the pool is empty.

variant.name: Misere
variant.description: The player who has the odd number of objects at the end wins.

variant.name: Number Of Counters
variant.description: The game can be played with any initial odd number of objects in the pool.
